component.name: createANewCardForACustomer
component.description: Creates a new card for a customer.

component.name: retrieveAnExistingCard
component.description: retrieve card details stored on a customer

component.description: update card details stored on a customer

component.description: permanently delete a card stored on a customer

component.description: list all cards belonging to a customer
